pr_title: Improve log settings in Hive unit tests

timeline.message: Add new log config file for Hive tests; Print Tez counters and execution summary
Move log4j2 file to hive3 module

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is the right license header. It should be the "Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation . . ." one.
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: yes right, I've updated them with the correct ASF header
